course_title: Literature of Ancient Egypt or the Ancient Near East

001.comments: Humour in the Bible and the Ancient Near East. Cross-listed with RELG 475B, RELG 500B. Visit cnrs.ubc.ca for full course descriptions. Majors and Honours seminar for students in Classical, Near Eastern and Religious Studies.COURSE RESTRICTIONS: If you do not meet the restrictions for this course or if the course is full, please register in the waitlist for RELG475B and you will be moved into one of NEST401 or RELG475B if a spot becomes available. Majors in CNRS specializing in Near Eastern Studies and Egyptology receive priority registration.

description: The main genres and texts of Egyptian and Ancient Near Eastern Literature and their modern Interpretation. Credit will be granted for only one of NEST 401 or 505.
